TopicTitle: Looking for another trajectories mod (to calculate reentry and visualize it)

Articles.Content:
Hi,

It's been a while for me with the mod Trajectories ([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104694-0-90-Trajectories-v1-1-3-%282015-01-25%29-atmospheric-predictions](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104694-0-90-Trajectories-v1-1-3-%282015-01-25%29-atmospheric-predictions)), and I can only say that this mod is awesome!

One problem for me though is, it becomes very laggy to the point I can no longer control the craft during the reentry, it happen when I activate autopilot on it or just set the target marker on the KSC so I can see a visual on the correct AoA on my navball...

So, I spent few hours looking around for another mod that do the same thing but I did not find anything (due to wrong search terms maybe...).

So anyone knows or uses a mod like that can help me with a name so I can try it?, I remember once seeing an image on the forums here with a reentry trajectory visualized on Duna, but with a different marker on the surface (was a circle, not an X like Trajectires)...

I really appreciate any help!
Mechjeb's landing autopilot has the ability to predict landing and aerobrake trajectories (without activating the autopilot part).
Moved to General Add-on Affairs, where requests for help finding mods are made.
